text: Now Boaz went up to the village gate and sat there. Then along came the guardian whom Boaz had mentioned to Ruth. Boaz said, “Come here, what’s-your-name, and sit down.” So he came and sat down.

Boaz <st data-num="03947" class="">chose</st> <st data-num="06235 0582">10</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">village</st> <st data-num="02205" class="">leaders</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="03427" class="">Sit down</st> <st data-num="06311" class="">here</st>!” So they <st data-num="03427" class="">sat down</st>.

Then Boaz <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="01350" class="">guardian</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="05281" class="">Naomi</st>, who has <st data-num="07725" class="">returned</st> from the <st data-num="07704" class="">region</st> of <st data-num="04124" class="">Moab</st>, is <st data-num="04376" class="">selling</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="02513" class="">portion</st> of <st data-num="07704" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> belongs to our <st data-num="0251" class="">relative</st> <st data-num="0458" class="">Elimelech</st>.

So <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="01540 0241">legally</st> <st data-num="0559 0559">informing</st> you:<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07069" class="">Acquire</st> it <st data-num="05048" class="">before</st> those <st data-num="03427" class="">sitting</st> here and <st data-num="05048" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="02205" class="">leaders</st> of my <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> you want to <st data-num="01350" class="">exercise</st> your <st data-num="01350" class="">right to redeem</st> it, then <st data-num="01350" class="">do so</st>.<n id="3" /> But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> <st data-num="03808 01350">not</st>, then <st data-num="05046" class="">tell</st> me<n id="4" /> so I will <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st>.<n id="5" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> you <st data-num="0369 02108">possess the first option</st> to <st data-num="01350" class="">redeem</st> it; <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am next in line <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> you.”<n id="6" /> He <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="01350" class="">redeem</st> it.”

Then <st data-num="01162" class="">Boaz</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="03117" class="">When</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="07069" class="">acquire</st> the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03027" class="">from</st> <st data-num="05281" class="">Naomi</st>,<n id="3" /> you must <st data-num="01571" class="">also</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="07069" class="">acquire</st> <st data-num="07327" class="">Ruth</st> the <st data-num="04125" class="">Moabite</st>,<n id="5" /> the <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> of our <st data-num="04191" class="">deceased</st> relative,<n id="6" /> in order to <st data-num="06965" class="">preserve</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">his</st> family <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> by raising up a descendant <st data-num="05921" class="">who will inherit</st> his <st data-num="05159" class="">property</st>.”<n id="7" />

The <st data-num="01350" class="">guardian</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “Then I am <st data-num="03808 03201">unable</st> to <st data-num="01350" class="">redeem</st> it, <st data-num="06435" class="">for</st> I would <st data-num="07843" class="">ruin</st> my own <st data-num="05159" class="">inheritance</st><n id="1" /> in that case. <st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> may <st data-num="01350" class="">exercise</st> my <st data-num="01353" class="">redemption option</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> I am <st data-num="03808 03201">unable</st> to <st data-num="01350" class="">redeem</st> it.”<n id="2" />

(Now <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">used to</st> be the <st data-num="03605" class="">customary</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">way</st> to <st data-num="05921 06965">finalize</st> a <st data-num="08545" class="">transaction</st> involving <st data-num="01353" class="">redemption</st> in <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>:<n id="1" /> A <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> would <st data-num="08025" class="">remove</st> his <st data-num="05275" class="">sandal</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> it to the <st data-num="07453" class="">other party</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> was a <st data-num="08584" class="">legally binding act</st><n id="3" /> in <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>.)

So the <st data-num="01350" class="">guardian</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="01162" class="">Boaz</st>, “You may <st data-num="07069" class="">acquire</st> it,” and he <st data-num="08025" class="">removed</st> his <st data-num="05275" class="">sandal</st>.<n id="1" />

Then <st data-num="01162" class="">Boaz</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="02205" class="">leaders</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>, “<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> are <st data-num="05707" class="">witnesses</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> I have <st data-num="07069" class="">acquired</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">from</st> <st data-num="05281" class="">Naomi</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> belonged to <st data-num="0458" class="">Elimelech</st>, <st data-num="03630" class="">Kilion</st>, and <st data-num="04248" class="">Mahlon</st>.

I have <st data-num="01571" class="">also</st> <st data-num="07069" class="">acquired</st> <st data-num="07327" class="">Ruth</st> the <st data-num="04125" class="">Moabite</st>, the <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> of <st data-num="04248" class="">Mahlon</st>, as my <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> to <st data-num="06965" class="">raise up</st> a <st data-num="08034 04191">descendant</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">who will inherit</st> his <st data-num="05159" class="">property</st><n id="1" /> so the <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> of the <st data-num="04191" class="">deceased</st> might <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03772" class="">disappear</st><n id="2" /> from <st data-num="05973" class="">among</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">relatives</st> and from his <st data-num="08179 04725">village</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> are <st data-num="05707" class="">witnesses</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st>.”

All the people who were at the gate and the elders replied, “We are witnesses. May the Lord make the woman who is entering your home like Rachel and Leah, both of whom built up the house of Israel! May you prosper in Ephrathah and become famous in Bethlehem.
May your family become like the family of Perez—whom Tamar bore to Judah—through the descendants the Lord gives you by this young woman.”
So Boaz married Ruth and slept with her. The Lord enabled her to conceive and she gave birth to a son.
The village women said to Naomi, “May the Lord be praised because he has not left you without a guardian today! May he become famous in Israel!

He will <st data-num="01961 07725">encourage</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">you</st> and <st data-num="03557" class="">provide for</st> you <st data-num="07872" class="">when</st> you are <st data-num="07872" class="">old</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> your <st data-num="03618" class="">daughter-in-law</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="0157" class="">loves</st> you, has <st data-num="03205" class="">given</st> him <st data-num="03205" class="">birth</st>. <st data-num="0834 01931">She</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="02896" class="">better</st> to you than <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>!”

<st data-num="05281" class="">Naomi</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="03206" class="">child</st> and <st data-num="07896" class="">placed</st> him on her <st data-num="02436" class="">lap</st>;<n id="1" /> she <st data-num="01961" class="">became</st> his <st data-num="0539" class="">caregiver</st>.<n id="2" />
The neighbor women gave him a name, saying, “A son has been born to Naomi.” They named him Obed. Now he became the father of Jesse—David’s father.
These are the descendants of Perez: Perez was the father of Hezron,

<st data-num="02696" class="">Hezron</st> <st data-num="03205" class="">was the father of</st> <st data-num="07410" class="">Ram</st>, <st data-num="07410" class="">Ram</st> <st data-num="03205" class="">was the father of</st> <st data-num="05992" class="">Amminadab</st>,

<st data-num="05992" class="">Amminadab</st> <st data-num="03205" class="">was the father of</st> <st data-num="05177" class="">Nachshon</st>, <st data-num="05177" class="">Nachshon</st> <st data-num="03205" class="">was the father of</st> <st data-num="08009" class="">Salmah</st>,

<st data-num="08012" class="">Salmon</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03205" class="">was the father of</st> <st data-num="01162" class="">Boaz</st>, <st data-num="01162" class="">Boaz</st> <st data-num="03205" class="">was the father of</st> <st data-num="05744" class="">Obed</st>,
Obed was the father of Jesse, and Jesse was the father of David.
